title: Unicorn Island: The Secret of Lost Luck
description: When Sam moves to a small South Carolina town full of secrets, she stumbles upon the truth behind Lost Luck: Foggy Harbor’s biggest mystery. From Epic! Originals, Unicorn Island is a magical middle grade series about a young girl who discovers a mysterious island full of mythical beasts and darker dangers! When Sam arrives in Foggy Harbor, South Carolina, all she can see is that it’s small, boring, and thousands of miles away from her mom. She dreads spending the summer there with her Uncle Mitch, and he's not exactly happy to see her, either. But Sam quickly learns that there’s more to Foggy Harbor than she’d thought. With the help of a new friend, Tuck, she sets out to uncover the magical truth behind the town's biggest mystery: the secret of Lost Luck.
author: Donna Galanti
